data.text: Nyaŋuɖoɖo kple gbe bɔbɔe tsia dziku nu,
Nunyalawo ƒe aɖe ɖea gɔmesese fiana,
Yehowa ƒe ŋkuwo le afi sia afi
Aɖe si hea dɔyɔyɔ vɛ la nye agbeti,
Bometsila doa vlo fofoa ƒe amehehe,
Kesinɔnu gã aɖe nɔa aƒe me na nunyala,
Nunyalawo ƒe nuyiwo kakaa sidzedze,
Yehowa léa fu ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe vɔsa,
Yehowa léa fu ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe mɔ,
Tohehe sesẽ le ame si tra le mɔ dzi la lalam
Ku kple tsiẽƒe le nuvo le Yehowa ŋkume,
Fewuɖula tsri nyagbename
Dzi si me dzidzɔ le la nana mo klẽna,
Dzi si si sidzedze su la dia gɔmesese
Ame siwo wole fu wɔmii la ƒe ŋkekewo katã nye vɔ̃
Nu sue si ŋu Yehowavɔvɔ̃ kpe ɖo la nyo wu
Amagbenuɖuɖu si ŋu lɔlɔ̃ kpe ɖo la nyo wu
Dɔmedzoetɔ hea mama vɛ,
Ŋuwo le kuviatɔ ƒe mɔ dzi,
Viŋutsu nunyala hea dzidzɔ vɛ na fofoa,
Bometsinuwɔwɔ doa dzidzɔ na ame manyanu,
Ɖoɖowo me gblẽna ne aɖaŋudede meli o,
Nyaŋuɖoɖo ɖe nunya me doa dzidzɔ na ame
Nunyalawo ƒe agbemɔ ɖo ta dzi,
Yehowa gbãa dadalawo ƒe aƒe ƒua anyi,
Yehowa léa fu ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe tameɖoɖo,
Ŋuklẽla hea fukpekpe vaa eƒe aƒe dzi,
Ame dzɔdzɔe ƒe dzi daa eƒe nyaŋuɖoɖowo kpɔ,
Yehowa le adzɔge na ame vɔ̃ɖiwo,
Mo si kɔ la doa dzidzɔ na dzi,
Ame si ɖoa to mokaname si hea agbe vɛ la,
Ame si doa toku amehehe la, doa vlo eɖokui,
Yehowavɔvɔ̃ fiaa nunya ame
